name: A Merchants Guide To The Galaxy
name_original: A Merchants Guide To The Galaxy
description:
you discover that the solar system is actually occupied by a species of aliens, proving once and for all that we are not alone in the universe. however they have only revealed themselves via a series of rustic looking shops so you do the only logical thing. try to exploit the economy.  however in your great adventures, you find yourself stuck on a planet, exploit the economy some more to get enough fuel to go home!

If for some reason you cannot enter a planet, move away from it and comeback to it. if it still does not work, the seed is probably broken so restart the game

use WASD to move, enter to enter a planet and mouse to interact with ui. and please use fullscreen for best experience
